text: appēāḷ addēhattinṟe janatayile satyaniṣēdhikaḷāya pramāṇimār paṟaññu: "iyāḷ niṅṅaḷeppēāluḷḷa oru manuṣyan mātramāṇ. niṅṅaḷekkāḷ valuppaṁ nēṭān nēākkukayāṇ ivan. satyattil daivaṁ icchiccirunneṅkil avan malakkukaḷe iṟakkittarumāyirunnu. ñaṅṅaḷuṭe pūrvapitākkaḷkkiṭayileānnuṁ iṅṅaneyeānn ñaṅṅaḷ kēṭṭiṭṭēyilla
